entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
